overview:
Director of Operations

Darshan holds fourteen years of experience in online media technologies. He worked as senior executive for California based Interbase Corporation & Koyo Graphic international and worked on high-end streaming media solutions for US and Japanese client bases. Earlier, Darshan also served as the Chief Technical Officer of Brainbow Computech Pvt. Ltd, an offshore development company in India for which he implemented an outsourcing work model with clients in the United States and UK and worked extensively for large live online sports events projects like Cricket World Cup and FIFA Soccer. His project portfolio includes impressive clientele like NASA, Bandai Inc, Clarion Inc., Pioneer, and Sanyo. Darshan earned his Bachelors in Computer Engineering from Bharati Vidyapeeth University, one of the largest educational institutions in India.
